attributes.action: Offer BACTERIO-PHAGE as the cure for MRSA and other hospital acquired infections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'Phage are natural virus like particles that eat bacteria. Eastern europe exploited this treatment because they had no access to western anti-biotics until recently. It works. Look it up in wikipedia. No UK testing or delay is needed because it's already in use in the EU (Poland). While you delay people die. Meanwhile, pay for patients to travel to Poland.
